Web Application Development

 

We develop innovative applications

Our interoperable, adaptive and secure architectures will allow you to face the challenges of tomorrow


 


S

pecialized in mobile and web development, our engineers can support you in every stages of the development process, from design to release.

Our distinction? We focus on Java JEE technologies, we master design and deployment of enterprise quality applications.

We maintain high quality requirements for all projects. It start with our hiring process: we are looking for highly skilled engineers but not only. We are looking for people with good human qualities, willing to learn new technologies in order to meet your needs.

Software factory

 


S

ince the beginning, Treeptik is focusing on industrializing software developments. Software factory allows us to improve productivity and quality of our projects. We rely on open-source tools and agile process we learnt to master. Our tool stack consists of:

  • Versioning: Git, SVN
  • Building: Maven, Ant, Gradle
  • Integration: Hudson, Jenkins
  • Testing: Junit, Selenium, Gatling
  • Cloud-computing: Cloudify, OpenStack, Amazon
  • Methodology: Scrum, XP

Quality analysis

 


T

here is a great temptation to cut back on development duration. However, Treeptik prefers to guarantee good code quality. This quality is the foundation of the robustness, the performance and the maintainability which are required for your project.

Our code analysis methods allow us to detect the critical parts of your application. We make it possible to restore the efficiency of your software. We are capable of defining a methodology adapted to your organization. We can help your team to identify the weaknesses of your systems and correct them. But we can also handle it for you in our office. Our tools

  • Sonar
  • FindBugs
  • CheckStyle
  • PMD
  • JUNIT
  • Youkit Java profiler
  • Gatling
  • Jmeter

Deployment

 


O

ur engineers master the main application servers around Java JEE technologies. We can deploy applications on distributed environments which require a high level of interoperability, performance and security.

Treeptik also develops solutions which allow to simplify deployment and management of applications in private or public cloud. Our approach and DevOps-oriented tools give your team autonomy on all secondary tasks such as server creation, integration environments, virtual machines and databases creation.

These solutions make your teams able to mount adaptive and monitored production environments more quickly . These are based on open-source tools such as: Cloudify, Openstack, Chef, Vagrant, Amazon.

 


 


Treeptik develop efficient and adaptive applications with standard technologies and open-source tools. Our goal : Help our customers to transform their information systems
— Fabien AMICO, CEO
